amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal laws which protect worker safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of two amendments offered en bloc (printed in the Congressional Record of January 18, 1995 as Nos. 7 and 8) to exempt any statute, or regulatory finding pertaining to worker safety from the effects of the provisions of the bill.

action.text: On agreeing to the Clayton amendments (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 262 (Roll no. 54).
